notes.title: Data availability
notes.p: The deep-sequence phylogenies and basic individual-level data analysed during the current study are available in the Dryad repository, 10.5061/dryad.7h46hg2. HIV-1 reads are available on reasonable request through the PANGEA consortium ( www.pangea-hiv.org) or the corresponding author. Please contact project manager Lucie Abeler-DÃ¶rner (lucie.abeler-dorner@bdi.ox.ac.uk) for further details. Additional individual-level data are available on reasonable request to RHSP or the corresponding author.
